mutants.code:
def sort_restaurants(N, restaurants):
    SPN = []
    for i in range(N):
        (S_i, P_i) = restaurants[i]
        SPN.append([S_i, +P_i, i + 1])
    SPN.sort()
    return [n for (s, p, n) in SPN]

def sort_restaurants(N, restaurants):
    SPN = []
    for i in range(N):
        (S_i, P_i) = restaurants[i]
        SPN.append([S_i, -P_i, i - 1])
    SPN.sort()
    return [n for (s, p, n) in SPN]

def sort_restaurants(N, restaurants):
    SPN = []
    for i in range(N):
        (S_i, P_i) = restaurants[i]
        SPN.append([S_i, -P_i, i * 1])
    SPN.sort()
    return [n for (s, p, n) in SPN]

def sort_restaurants(N, restaurants):
    SPN = []
    for i in range(N):
        (S_i, P_i) = restaurants[i]
        SPN.append([S_i, -P_i, i + 2])
    SPN.sort()
    return [n for (s, p, n) in SPN]

def sort_restaurants(N, restaurants):
    SPN = []
    for i in range(N):
        (S_i, P_i) = restaurants[i]
        SPN.append([S_i, -P_i, i + 0])
    SPN.sort()
    return [n for (s, p, n) in SPN]

def sort_restaurants(N, restaurants):
    SPN = []
    for i in range(N):
        (S_i, P_i) = restaurants[i]
        SPN.append([S_i, -P_i, i + 0])
    SPN.sort()

def sort_restaurants(N, restaurants):
    SPN = []
    for i in range(N):
        (S_i, P_i) = restaurants[i]
        SPN.append([S_i, -P_i, i + -1])
    SPN.sort()
    return [n for (s, p, n) in SPN]
